channel.title: Basic markdown on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Basic markdown on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Basic text elements
item.description: Page demonstrates basic text elements of markdown. We are interested here in size of headers, spaces between text elements, etc. The content of this page is shown via shortcode. Welcome h1 Introduction h2 Subheading h3 Another Subheading h3 Subheading h4 Another subheading h4 Subheading h5 Subheading h6 Welcome h1 Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

item.title: List elements
item.description: Page demonstrates basic list elements. We are interested here in list identation, spaces between list and paragraphs etc. Unordered list item 1 item 2 Another item Another item Another item item 3 item 4 Ordered list Item 1 Item 2 Item 3 Item 3a Item 3b Paragraph in section to compare gaps against lists Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
